about.name: Portland, Maine
about.info_text: Portland is a charming coastal city located in the New England region of the United States. It is known for its picturesque harbor, historic architecture, and a thriving culinary scene. The city offers a unique blend of maritime heritage, cultural attractions, and natural beauty, making it a popular destination for both residents and visitors. With its fresh seafood, vibrant arts community, and numerous outdoor activities, Portland has something to offer everyone.
about.facts_text:
Population: Approximately 66,000
State: Maine
Time Zone: Eastern Time Zone (UTC-05:00)
Language: English
Currency: United States Dollar (USD)
about.climate_text: Portland experiences a humid continental climate with four distinct seasons. Winters are cold and snowy, while summers are mild and comfortable, making it an ideal destination for outdoor enthusiasts.

attractions_card.title: Old Port District
attractions_card.description: The Old Port District is a historic waterfront area known for its cobblestone streets, boutique shops, restaurants, and vibrant nightlife.

attractions_card.title: Portland Head Light
attractions_card.description: Portland Head Light is an iconic lighthouse situated in Cape Elizabeth, offering breathtaking coastal views and a museum inside the former keeper's house.

attractions_card.title: Casco Bay Islands
attractions_card.description: Casco Bay is dotted with picturesque islands, accessible by ferry, where you can explore nature, go hiking, or enjoy a peaceful getaway.

attractions_card.title: Victoria Mansion
attractions_card.description: The Victoria Mansion, also known as the Morse-Libby House, is a historic mansion with stunning interiors and architecture, open for tours.

attractions_card.title: Eastern Promenade
attractions_card.description: The Eastern Promenade is a scenic park offering panoramic views of Casco Bay, walking trails, and a great spot for picnics.

attractions_card.title: Portland Museum of Art
attractions_card.description: The Portland Museum of Art features a diverse collection of artwork, including pieces by renowned Maine artists and impressive exhibits.

attractions_card.title: Wadsworth-Longfellow House
attractions_card.description: The Wadsworth-Longfellow House is a historic home and museum that was once the childhood home of poet Henry Wadsworth Longfellow.

food_card.title: Lobster Roll
food_card.description: Portland is renowned for its delicious lobster rolls, a must-try local delicacy often served in a buttered, toasted bun.

food_card.title: Seafood Chowder
food_card.description: Seafood chowder is a hearty and comforting dish made with a creamy broth and a variety of fresh seafood, perfect for cool evenings.

food_card.title: Blueberry Pie
food_card.description: Maine is known for its wild blueberries, and a slice of homemade blueberry pie is a delightful dessert you can find in Portland.

food_card.title: Craft Beer
food_card.description: Portland has a thriving craft beer scene, with numerous local breweries and pubs offering a wide range of unique and flavorful brews.

hotels_card.title: The Press Hotel
hotels_card.description: The Press Hotel is a stylish boutique hotel located in the Old Port District, offering luxurious accommodations and a unique newspaper-themed design.

hotels_card.title: Inn by the Sea
hotels_card.description: Inn by the Sea is a beachfront resort in Cape Elizabeth, providing a tranquil coastal escape with beautiful ocean views and eco-friendly practices.

hotels_card.title: The Westin Portland Harborview
hotels_card.description: The Westin Portland Harborview is a historic hotel in downtown Portland, offering comfortable rooms and a rooftop bar with panoramic city views.

hotels_card.title: Hyatt Place Portland-Old Port
hotels_card.description: Hyatt Place is a modern hotel in the Old Port District, providing spacious rooms and convenient access to the city's attractions.

transport_card.title: Portland International Jetport
transport_card.description: The Portland International Jetport (PWM) is the city's primary airport, serving domestic and limited international flights.

transport_card.title: METRO Bus
transport_card.description: The METRO Bus system provides public transportation within Portland and the surrounding areas, with various routes and schedules.

transport_card.title: Biking
transport_card.description: Portland is a bike-friendly city with bike lanes and trails, making it a great way to explore the city and its scenic surroundings.

transport_card.title: Car Rentals
transport_card.description: Car rental agencies are available in Portland for those who prefer to have their own transportation while visiting.
